trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The `Scroll` event occurs when the user changes the value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il `Scroll` evento si verifica quando l'utente modifica il valore della barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: This event can result from a variety of actions, such as clicking a scroll bar arrow, pressing the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW, or dragging the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento può essere causato da una serie di azioni, ad esempio facendo clic su una freccia della barra di scorrimento, premere la freccia su o freccia giù o trascinando la casella di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollEventArgs specifies the type of scroll event that occurred and the new value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il ScrollEventArgs specifica il tipo di evento di scorrimento che si è verificato e il nuovo valore della barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A> property to determine the scroll bar orientation for the `Scroll` event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>proprietà per determinare l'orientamento della barra di scorrimento per il `Scroll` evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `Scroll` event occurs for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il `Scroll` si verifica l'evento di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> usando i valori specificati per il <> </> *> e <> </> *> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.OldValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> usando i valori specificati per il <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The old value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il valore precedente per la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> usando i valori specificati per il <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.OldValue*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> usando i valori specificati per il <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The old value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il valore precedente per la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>della barra di scorrimento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> property will be changed to.
trans-unit.target: Il valore numerico che la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>proprietà verrà modificata in.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the old <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la precedente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>della barra di scorrimento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> property contained before it changed.
trans-unit.target: Il valore numerico che la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>proprietà contenuta prima della modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the scroll bar orientation that raised the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'orientamento della barra di scorrimento che ha generato il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: You would typically use the ScrollOrientation property to determine the scroll bar orientation that raised the `Scroll` event, such as with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà ScrollOrientation in genere per determinare l'orientamento della barra di scorrimento che ha generato il `Scroll` evento, ad esempio con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of scroll event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di evento di scorrimento che si è verificato.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valori.
